alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Eastern Union; Hudson; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Passaic; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 3:53PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong Showers And Thunderstorms Expected Along A Cold Front... At 347 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Walton to Paradise Valley to near Claussville. Movement was east at 35 mph. These showers and thunderstorms will move through the western half of the CWA between 430 PM and 6 PM. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Jamaica, Yonkers, Paterson, Elizabeth, Stamford, Flatbush, New Rochelle, Flushing, Passaic, Bayonne, White Plains, Wayne and Mott Haven. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
